TopicTitle: Are there any two-way fuel lines?

Articles.Content:
I am looking for a bi-directional fuel line, as the stock ones only go in the direction of the arrow...

I use a lot of compact building techniques, and trying to squeeze in 2 opposite-facing fuel lines in small places where required on my space-planes and landers has resulted in a few off-balance ships due to the fuel lines not connecting properly...

I'm just wondering if anyone knows of any mod that adds one, or if one could be made? I feel like it'd be pretty easy.

I tried a quick search and couldn't find anything.
How would your engine know what to draw from? A bidirectional fuel line makes a loop.
You'd be better off using a fuel balancing mod. As NathanKell mentioned, you'd create a loop and likely annoy the Kraken...
If you make a fuel line with KAS parts you can change the flow direction whenever you want, even mid-flight.

I already have 2 opposite-direction fuel lines on some designs, and it works fine.

All of the tanks drain exactly symmetrically...
